name: JewishHolidayTrivia
0:
”Alexa, open jewish holiday trivia”
”Alexa, start jewish holiday trivia”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: jewish holiday trivia
des:
Alexa quizzes you on trivia topics on the subject of Jewish Holidays. Provide the answer and try to achieve a high score. 

Sample questions: 

" In what Hebrew month is Passover celebrated ?"
" In what city did the story of Purim occur? "
" What does the Hebrew word Chanukah mean ?"

Alexa provides multiple choice answers for you to choose from.

These Q&A was taken from www.jewish-trivia.com please visit them for much more.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
